column4: Hey guys I'm a Linux newb I got a quick question. I have an application that I want to start on boot up and it wants me to place it in the rcX.d folder in init.d but problem is I don't have one. Should I have one? Or do I have to make it first?
do you want it at the system startup, or just when you login?
then you should use bum - Boot-Up Manager
